argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | reximdva0.1 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ps ) |
| 2 |  | #P_n0 | |- ( A =/= (/) <-> E. x x e. A ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_ex | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A -> ps ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_ancld | |- ( ph -> ( x e. A -> ( x e. A /\ ps ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_eximdv | |- ( ph -> ( E. x x e. A -> E. x ( x e. A /\ ps ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_imp | |- ( ( ph /\ E. x x e. A ) -> E. x ( x e. A /\ ps ) ) |
| 7 | 2, 6 | #P_sylan2b | |- ( ( ph /\ A =/= (/) ) -> E. x ( x e. A /\ ps ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_df-rex | |- ( E. x e. A ps <-> E. x ( x e. A /\ ps ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( ph /\ A =/= (/) ) -> E. x e. A ps ) |
